de.must.print
Class ProportionalListReportByHtml

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      de.must.middle.InterruptibleBatchThread
          de.must.print.ProportionalListReportByHtml
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controllable, ProportionalListReport, java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
TableToHTML
public abstract class ProportionalListReportByHtml
extends InterruptibleBatchThread
implements ProportionalListReport

HTML implementation of the report interface for lists with proportional column definition.
